 2018-09882018-07-16,  , 
ActFinancial Administration Act
PrecisAppointment of DEAN A. COSMAN of Ottawa, Ontario, to be President and Chief Executive Officer of the Canada Deposit Insurance Corporation, to hold office during pleasure for a term of six months, or until such time as a President and Chief Executive Officer is appointed, whichever is earlier, effective June 19, 2018.
